mapper.insert: insert into comments (parent_id, user_id, post_id, content) values (#{parentId}, #{userId}, #{postId}, #{content})
mapper.select: select count(*) from comments where post_id = #{postId} and is_deleted = 'N'

select comment_id, u.user_id, parent_id, c.post_id, u.name, content, has_child, created_at, updated_at from comments c inner join user u on c.user_id = u.user_id where is_deleted = 'N' and post_id = #{postId} order by created_at desc

select comment_id, u.user_id, parent_id, c.post_id, u.name, content, has_child, created_at, updated_at from comments c inner join user u on c.user_id = u.user_id where is_deleted = 'N' and u.user_id = #{userId} and comment_id = #{commentId}
mapper.update: update comments set is_deleted = 'Y' where is_deleted = 'N' and parent_id = #{parentId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from comments where is_deleted = 'N' and parent_id = #{parentId}
